name: log-multiple-record
description: Represents a BACnet Log Multiple Record, which contains a timestamped entry that can hold multiple logged values or a status indicator for trend log buffer objects.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The date and time when the log entry was recorded.

fields.name: log-data
fields.description: The log data, which can be a status indicator, a series of values, or a time change notification.
